title._content: [Unidentified soldier in uniform with musket, canteen, cup, and haversack; either Confederate or Union] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in uniform with musket, canteen, cup, and haversack; either Confederate or Union] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.2 x 8.1 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather, floral and scroll design. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Published in: More Confederate faces : photographs of Confederates / William A. Albaugh. Wilmington, N.C. : Broadfoot, 1993, p. 116. Subjects: Soldiers--1860-1870. Military uniforms--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Canteens--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.32120 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2799
